TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RouteTable extends System.Object

summary.span: 儲存應用程式的 URL 路由。

span.span: Stores the URL routes for an application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 為 URL 的模式適用於處理要求，並可用來動態建構 Url 的路由。Routes are URL patterns that are used for processing requests and that can be used to construct URLs dynamically. 屬性是`static`屬性 (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中)，其中包含所有的路由應用程式中，用來指定如何處理要求的類別比對 URL 要求。The property is a `static` property (`Shared` in Visual Basic) that contains all the routes in an application that are used to specify how a URL request is matched to a class that handles the request. 若要指定一個路由，您新增至路由定義屬性。To specify a route, you add the route definition to the property. 一般而言，您將路由新增至屬性的事件處理常式從`Application_Start`Global.asax 檔案中的事件。Typically, you add routes to the property from an event handler for the `Application_Start` event in the Global.asax file. 當 ASP.NET 應用程式處理要求時，應用程式逐一查看集合的路由中屬性來尋找相符的格式的 URL 要求的路由。When an ASP.NET application handles a request, the application iterates through the collection of routes in the property to find the route that matches the format of the URL request. 您將加入的路由順序屬性特別重要，因為應用程式會使用它在集合中尋找第一個路由的 URL 相符。The order of the routes that you add to the property is significant, because the application uses the first route that it finds in the collection that matches the URL. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何將加入物件屬性。The following example shows how to add a object to the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Routing.RouteTable.Routes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.RouteTable.Routes/cs/Global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Routing.RouteTable.Routes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.RouteTable.Routes/vb/Global.asax#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Routes As RouteCollection
public: static property System::Web::Routing::RouteCollection ^ Routes { System::Web::Routing::RouteCollection ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得從 類別衍生的物件集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of objects that derive from the class.

value.span: 包含集合中所有路由的物件。

span.span: An object that contains all the routes in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 為 URL 的模式適用於處理要求，並可用來動態建構 Url 的路由。Routes are URL patterns that are used for processing requests and that can be used to construct URLs dynamically. 屬性是`static`屬性 (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中)，代表用來指定如何處理要求的類別比對 URL 要求的所有物件。The property is a `static` property (`Shared` in Visual Basic) that represents all the objects that are used to specify how a URL request is matched to a class that handles the request. 若要指定一個路由，您新增至路由定義屬性。To specify a route, you add the route definition to the property. 一般而言，您將路由新增至屬性的事件處理常式從`Application_Start`Global.asax 檔案中的事件。Typically, you add routes to the property from an event handler for the `Application_Start` event in the Global.asax file. 當 ASP.NET 應用程式處理要求時，應用程式逐一查看集合的路由中屬性來尋找相符的格式的 URL 要求的路由。When an ASP.NET application handles a request, the application iterates through the collection of routes in the property to find the route that matches the format of the URL request. 您將加入的路由順序屬性特別重要，因為應用程式會使用第一個路由集合中符合 URL。The order of the routes that you add to the property is significant, because the application uses the first route in the collection that matches the URL. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何將加入物件屬性。The following example shows how to add a object to the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Routing.RouteTable.Routes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.RouteTable.Routes/cs/Global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Routing.RouteTable.Routes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.RouteTable.Routes/vb/Global.asax#1)]
